pkgmetadata.longdescription: BreedWheat Genomic Selection Pipeline // Package for Breed Wheat Genomic Selection Pipeline. The R package 'BWGS' is developed by Louis Gautier Tran louis.gautier.tran@gmail.com and Gilles Charmet gilles.charmet@inra.fr. This repository is forked from original repository https://forgemia.inra.fr/umr-gdec/bwgs and modified as a R package.
